name: Hippity Hoppity - the Beaver wants the Frog off its Property
name_original: Hippity Hoppity - the Beaver wants the Frog off its Property
description:
The frog is a hoppy little fella. It loves nothing more than singing and bringing joy to the woodland animals. Only the beaver toadally hates the frog’s song. But oh no, the frog decided to sing right under the beaver’s dam! Now the frigging beaver throws trash at the frog. Watch out little friend, don’t let the trash hit you!
